name: The Bart Simpson Quiz #5 | 'Simpsons' - Characters | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "The Bart Wants What It Wants",  Bart was dating Rainier Wolfcastle's daughter, Greta.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Bart and Greta broke up after Bart blew her off to make fun of Principal Skinner.  He then tries to win Greta back by travelling to Canada on the set of her father's new movie "Undercover Nerd".

questions.text: In "The Lastest Gun in the West", what was the name of the cowboy Bart makes his role model?
questions.explanation:
Buck & Buck McCoy.

	Buck McCoy is revealed to be an alcoholic when he guest stars on the Krusty the Clown Show.  He later becomes the talk of the town for ending a bank robbery.

questions.text: In the "Tales from the Public Domain" vignette of "Hamlet", what role does Bart play?
questions.explanation:
Hamlet.

	Bart plays Hamlet, Ralph plays Laertes, Moe plays Claudius, and Rosencrantz is played by Karl.  All of the main characters die in the vignette.

questions.text: What was the name of Bart's comic strip in "I am Furious Yellow"?
questions.explanation:
Angry Dad.

	Angry Dad became a top-viewed comic site on the internet, and Bart based it on Homer's rage.  Homer soon decides to give up rage and he nearly dies of pent up rage in his system.

questions.text: In the Halloween vignette "The Island of Doctor Hibbert", Bart becomes what animal?
questions.explanation:
Spider.

	This vignette was featured in Treehouse of Horror XIII.  "The Island of Doctor Hibbert" parodies "The Island of Doctor Moreau" in which a mad scientist turns people into animals on his island.

questions.text: When Bart becomes emancipated in "Barting Over", what extreme sports athlete lives upstairs?
questions.explanation:
Tony Hawk.

	Tony Hawk and Blink 182 have loud parties in Bart's apartment building.  Soon, Bart becomes a member of the "Skewed Extreme Sports Tour", but moves back home with the family.

questions.text: In "The Bart of War" Bart becomes a member of "The Pre-Teen Braves".  Who was the original group leader?
questions.explanation:
Homer.

	Homer originally led the boys, but Marge and Lisa livened the group up a bit.  Homer retired from his position.  "The Pre-teen Braves" fought Milhouse's group called "The Cavalry Kids".

questions.text: In the Halloween short "Stop the World, I Want to Goof Off", what does Bart get that allows him and Milhouse to stop time?
questions.explanation:
Stopwatch.

	Milhouse and Bart accidentaly break the stopwatch, and they spend 15 years trying to fix it.  This vignette pays homage to "Clockstoppers".

questions.text: In "Margical History Tour", Bart plays what young composer?
questions.explanation:
Mozart.

	Lisa plays Salieri although Salieri wasn't a child or a woman or related to Mozart.  Also, Homer plays Mozart's father, but Mozart's father died 4 years before Mozart.

questions.text: Who voices Bart Simpson's character on "The Simpsons"?
questions.explanation:
Nancy Cartwright.

	Nancy Cartwright has also voiced characters on "Animaniacs", "Kim Possible", Chuckie Finster on "Rugrats".
